price: A ordem de Allah há de chegar: então, não a apresseis. Glorificado e Sublimado seja Ele, acima do que idolatram.
arabic: أَتَىٰٓ أَمۡرُ ٱللَّهِ فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُوهُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥ وَتَعَٰلَىٰ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: atā amru al-lahi falā tastaʿjilūhu sub'ḥānahu wataʿālā ʿammā yush'rikūna
